Der Film handelt von einem egozentrischen Chirurgen, Dr. Michael Reynolds (Woody Harrelson), der durch eine Krebsdiagnose des StraftÃ¤ters Blue zum Umdenken gezwungen wird. Der junge StraftÃ¤ter Blue nimmt Dr. Reynolds als Geisel und flÃ¼chtet mit ihm in die WÃ¼ste. metadata.Plot: Michael Reynolds is a rich oncologist who has a one hundred seventy-five thousand dollar sports car, a multi-million dollar house, and a new boost in his career. Brandon "Blue" Monroe is a dying patient who kidnaps Reynolds. They are going to a legendary Navajo healing place while a manhunt closes in. Soon the men get closer in understanding, and to the place that may save them both.
metadata.Actors: Woody Harrelson, Jon Seda, Anne Bancroft
